name: Kenneth E. BLAIR, Appellant, v. WORKMEN'S COMPENSATION APPEAL BOARD (GM & W COAL COMPANY, INC.)
name_abbreviation: Blair v. Workmen's Compensation Appeal Board

judges: Before FLAHERTY, C.J., and ZAPPALA, CAPPY, CASTILLE, NIGRO, NEWMAN and SAYLOR, JJ.
parties: Kenneth E. BLAIR, Appellant, v. WORKMEN'S COMPENSATION APPEAL BOARD (GM & W COAL COMPANY, INC.).

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Appeal dismissed as having been improvidently granted.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Blair V. Pawlowski, David J. Tulowitzki, Ebensburg, for Kenneth E. Blair.
Toni J. Minner, Anne M. Coholan, Paul E. Sutter, Pittsburgh, for GM & W Coal and Old Republic.
casebody.head_matter:
Kenneth E. BLAIR, Appellant, v. WORKMEN'S COMPENSATION APPEAL BOARD (GM & W COAL COMPANY, INC.).
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Sept. 14, 1998.
Decided Oct. 8, 1998.
Blair V. Pawlowski, David J. Tulowitzki, Ebensburg, for Kenneth E. Blair.
Toni J. Minner, Anne M. Coholan, Paul E. Sutter, Pittsburgh, for GM & W Coal and Old Republic.
David B. Hawkins, Secretary, WCAB.
Before FLAHERTY, C.J., and ZAPPALA, CAPPY, CASTILLE, NIGRO, NEWMAN and SAYLOR, JJ.
